# OIAN
![Superficial intrinsic back muscles Right side posterior view @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020](/Alchemy Archive/Anatomy/OIANs/images/superficial intrinsic back mm fig3.8 gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020.png){#fig-superficialbackmm38agilroyAtlasAnatomy2020}

![Superficial intrinsic back muscles posterior view @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020](/Alchemy Archive/Anatomy/OIANs/images/superficial intrinsic back mm fig3.10a gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020.png){#fig-superficialbackmm310agilroyAtlasAnatomy2020}

| Muscle  | Origin  | Insertion | Nerve | Action |
|--------|----------|-----------|-------|--------|
| Splenisu Capitis | Nuchal lig; C7-T3 SP @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 | 2-4th ribs (sup border) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 | spinal nn. T2-T5 (Ant ramus) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 | Elevates ribs @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 |

: Splenius Capitis OIAN {.striped .hover}

## Origin
- Nuchal ligament @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020
- C7-T3 or T4 SP @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Insertion
- Lateral 1/3 nuchal line (occipital bone) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020
- Mastoid process (temporal bone) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Innervation
spinal nn. C1-C6 (Post rami, lateral branches) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Action

- **Bilateral:** Extends C/S and head @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020
- **Unilateral:** I/L head SB and Rotation @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Muscle groups
Splenius Capitis is part of the [Superficial intrinsic back muscle group]({{< var ref-oians >}})
